mov0.plot: Atticus Finch, a lawyer in the Depression-era South, defends a black man against an undeserved rape charge, and his kids against prejudice.
mov0.title: To Kill a Mockingbird

mov1.plot: Mankind finds a mysterious, obviously artificial, artifact buried on the moon and, with the intelligent computer HAL, sets off on a quest.
mov1.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey

mov2.plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
mov2.title: The Godfather

mov3.plot: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York is portrayed while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on his crime syndicate stretching from Lake Tahoe, Nevada to pre-revolution 1958 Cuba.
mov3.title: The Godfather: Part II

mov4.plot: When a gigantic great white shark begins to menace the small island community of Amity, a police chief, a marine scientist and grizzled fisherman set out to stop it.
mov4.title: Jaws

mov5.plot: A TV network cynically exploits a deranged ex-TV anchor's ravings and revelations about the media for their own profit.
mov5.title: Network

mov6.plot: A mining ship, investigating a suspected SOS, lands on a distant planet. The crew discovers some strange creatures and investigates.
mov6.title: Alien

mov7.plot: An airplane crew takes ill. Surely the only person capable of landing the plane is an ex-pilot afraid to fly. But don't call him Shirley.
mov7.title: Airplane!

mov8.plot: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil and spiritual presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from the past and of the future.
mov8.title: The Shining

mov9.plot: Archeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the US government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis.
mov9.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark

mov10.plot: Deckard, a blade runner, has to track down and terminate 4 replicants who hijacked a ship in space and have returned to earth seeking their maker.
mov10.title: Blade Runner

mov11.plot: A group of Earth children help a stranded alien botanist return home.
mov11.title: E.T.: The Extra-Terrestrial

mov12.plot: Biography of Mahatma Gandhi, the lawyer who became the famed leader of the Indian revolts against the British through his philosophy of non-violent protest.
mov12.title: Gandhi

mov13.plot: Three unemployed parapsychology professors set up shop as a unique ghost removal service.
mov13.title: Ghostbusters

mov14.plot: A man wanders out of the desert not knowing who he is. His brother finds him, and helps to pull his...
mov14.title: Paris, Texas

mov15.plot: A human-looking, apparently unstoppable cyborg is sent from the future to kill Sarah Connor; Kyle Reese is sent to stop it.
mov15.title: The Terminator

mov16.plot: A troubled boy dives into a wonderous fantasy world through the pages of a mysterious book.
mov16.title: The NeverEnding Story

mov17.plot: In 1985, Doc Brown invents time travel; in 1955, Marty McFly accidentally prevents his parents from meeting, putting his own existence at stake.
mov17.title: Back to the Future

mov18.plot: Six guests are invited to a strange house and must cooperate with the staff to solve a murder mystery.
mov18.title: Clue

mov19.plot: A group of kids embark on a wild adventure after finding a pirate treasure map.
mov19.title: The Goonies

mov20.plot: A boy and his brother don't get along well. In order to let her ill mother rest, they're separated and sent each one with their relatives.
mov20.title: My Life as a Dog

mov21.plot: The planet from Alien has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, the rescue team has impressive firepower, but will it be enough?
mov21.title: Aliens

mov22.plot: An intellectually nonconformist monk investigates a series of mysterious deaths in an isolated abbey.
mov22.title: The Name of the Rose

mov23.plot: After the death of a friend, a writer recounts a boyhood journey to find the body of a missing boy.
mov23.title: Stand by Me

mov24.plot: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psionic psychopath that only two kids and a group of psionics can stop.
mov24.title: Akira

mov25.plot: New York cop John McClane gives terrorists a dose of their own medicine as they hold hostages in an LA office building.
mov25.title: Die Hard

mov26.plot: In London, four very different people team up to commit armed robbery, then try to doublecross each other for the loot.
mov26.title: A Fish Called Wanda

mov27.plot: A filmmaker recalls his childhood, when he fell in love with the movies at his village's theater and formed a deep friendship with the theater's projectionist.
mov27.title: Cinema Paradiso

mov28.plot: Selfish yuppie Charlie Babbitt's father left a fortune to his savant brother Raymond and a pittance to Charlie; they travel cross-country.
mov28.title: Rain Man

mov29.plot: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wonderous forest spirits who live nearby.
mov29.title: My Neighbor Totoro

mov30.plot: An account of Baron Munchausen's supposed travels and fantastical experiences with his band of misfits.
mov30.title: The Adventures of Baron Munchausen

mov31.plot: The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being the clownishly homicidal Joker.
mov31.title: Batman

mov32.plot: The story of Christy Brown, who was born with cerebral palsy. He learned to paint and write with his only controllable limb - his left foot.
mov32.title: My Left Foot

mov33.plot: An eight year-old, who is accidentally left behind while his family flies to France for Christmas, has to defend his home against idiotic burglars.
mov33.title: Home Alone

mov34.plot: When Capt. Hook kidnaps his children, an adult Peter Pan must return to Neverland and reclaim his youthful spirit in order to challenge his old enemy.
mov34.title: Hook

mov35.plot: A young FBI cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to receive his help on catching another serial killer who skins his victims.
mov35.title: The Silence of the Lambs

mov36.plot: The cyborg who once tried to kill Sarah Connor must now protect her teenage son, John Connor, from an even more powerful and advanced Terminator.
mov36.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day

mov37.plot: When a corrupt businessman and the grotesque Penguin plot to take control of Gotham City, only Batman can stop them, while the Catwoman has her own agenda.
mov37.title: Batman Returns

mov38.plot: A story about a boy called Benny, who watches violent movies, including a home-made video of a pig being slaughtered. Soon after, Benny loses his mind and kills a girl and films the murder with his video camera.
mov38.title: Benny's Video

mov39.plot: After a simple jewelery heist goes terribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.
mov39.title: Reservoir Dogs

mov40.plot: A weatherman finds himself living the same day over and over again.
mov40.title: Groundhog Day

mov41.plot: Jack Skellington, king of Halloweentown, discovers Christmas Town, but doesn't quite understand the concept.
mov41.title: The Nightmare Before Christmas

mov42.plot: The story of a romantic relationship between a grown-up and a child. Set in the Netherlands near the end of WWII...
mov42.title: For a Lost Soldier

mov43.plot: Forrest Gump, while not intelligent, has accidentally been present at many historic moments, but his true love, Jenny, eludes him.
mov43.title: Forrest Gump

mov44.plot: Tricked into thinking he killed his father, a guilt ridden lion cub flees into exile and abandons his identity as the future King.
mov44.title: The Lion King

mov45.plot: Professional assassin Leon reluctantly takes care of 12-year-old Mathilda, a neighbor whose parents are killed, and teaches her his trade.
mov45.title: Leon: The Professional

mov46.plot: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic super-hero when he wears a mysterious mask.
mov46.title: The Mask

mov47.plot: The lives of two mob hit men, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
mov47.title: Pulp Fiction

mov48.plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
mov48.title: The Shawshank Redemption

mov49.plot: A young cop must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.
mov49.title: Speed

mov50.plot: Pet detective Ace Ventura comes out of retirement to investigate the disappearance of a rare white bat, the symbol of an African tribe.
mov50.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls

mov51.plot: Film adaptation of street tough Jim Carroll's epistle about his kaleidoscopic free fall into the harrowing world of drug addiction...
mov51.title: The Basketball Diaries

mov52.plot: In a dystopian future, Dredd, the most famous judge (a cop with instant field judiciary powers) is convicted for a crime he did not commit while his murderous counterpart escapes.
mov52.title: Judge Dredd

mov53.plot: When two kids play an old magic board-game they found, they release a man trapped for decades in it and a host of dangers that can only be stopped by finishing the game.
mov53.title: Jumanji

mov54.plot: A young girl is relegated to servitude at a boarding school when her father goes missing and is presumed dead.
mov54.title: A Little Princess

mov55.plot: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his modus operandi.
mov55.title: Se7en

mov56.plot: A cowboy toy is profoundly threatened and jealous when a fancy spaceman toy supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.
mov56.title: Toy Story

mov57.plot: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.
mov57.title: Twelve Monkeys

mov58.plot: The Earth is invaded by Martians with irresistible weapons and a cruel sense of humor.
mov58.title: Mars Attacks!

mov59.plot: An American agent, under false suspicion of disloyalty, must discover and expose the real spy without the help of his organization.
mov59.title: Mission: Impossible

mov60.plot: A killer known as ghost face begins killing off teenagers, and as the body count begins rising, one girl and her friends find themselves contemplating the Rules of horror films as they find themselves living in a real-life one.
mov60.title: Scream

mov61.plot: Michael Jordan agrees to help the Looney Toons play a basketball game vs. alien slavers to determine their freedom.
mov61.title: Space Jam

mov62.plot: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out, despite the allure of the drugs and influence of friends.
mov62.title: Trainspotting

mov63.plot: Bean works as a caretaker at Britain's formidable Royal National Gallery, and his bosses want to fire him because he sleeps at work all the time...
mov63.title: Bean

mov64.plot: Dude Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire Lebowski, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.
mov64.title: The Big Lebowski

mov65.plot: The story of a young man's adventures in the Californian pornography industry of the 1970s and 1980s.
mov65.title: Boogie Nights

mov66.plot: A Jewish man has a wonderful romance with the help of his humour, but must use that same quality to protect his son in a Nazi death camp.
mov66.title: Life Is Beautiful

mov67.plot: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr Zorg at bay.
mov67.title: The Fifth Element

mov68.plot: Wealthy financier Nicholas Van Orton gets a strange birthday present from wayward brother Conrad: a live-action game that consumes his life.
mov68.title: The Game

mov69.plot: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.
mov69.title: Gattaca

mov70.plot: Will Hunting, a janitor at MIT, has a gift for mathematics but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.
mov70.title: Good Will Hunting

mov71.plot: A shooting at an all night diner is investigated by three LA policemen in their own unique ways.
mov71.title: L.A. Confidential

mov72.plot: Fictional romantic tale of a rich girl and poor boy who meet on the ill-fated voyage of the 'unsinkable' ship.
mov72.title: Titanic

mov73.plot: An insurance salesman/adjuster discovers his entire life is actually a TV show.
mov73.title: The Truman Show

mov74.plot: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.
mov74.title: American History X

mov75.plot: A rather neurotic ant tries to break from his totalitarian society while trying to win the affection of the princess he loves.
mov75.title: Antz

mov76.plot: When an asteroid the size of Texas is headed for Earth the world's best deep core drilling team is sent to nuke the rock from the inside.
mov76.title: Armageddon

mov77.plot: An American serving in the French Foreign Legion on an archaeological dig at the ancient city of Hamunaptra accidentally awakens a Mummy.
mov77.title: The Mummy

mov78.plot: A misfit ant, looking for warriors to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.
mov78.title: A Bug's Life

mov79.plot: Chicken Run is a comedy escape drama with a touch of passion set on a sinister Yorks chicken farm in 1950's England
mov79.title: Chicken Run

mov80.plot: An abortion clinic worker with a special heritage is called upon to save the existence of humanity from being negated by two renegade angels trying to exploit a loophole and re-enter Heaven.
mov80.title: Dogma

mov81.plot: The story about the lives of guards on death row leading up to the execution of black man accused of child murder & rape, who has the power of faith healing.
mov81.title: The Green Mile

mov82.plot: In a small village in the Shire a young Hobbit named Frodo has been entrusted with an ancient Ring. Now he must embark on an Epic quest to the Cracks of Doom in order to destroy it.
mov82.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring

mov83.plot: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of US soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.
mov83.title: Saving Private Ryan

mov84.plot: Before elections, a spin-doctor and a Hollywood producer join efforts to fabricate a war in order to cover-up a presidential sex scandal.
mov84.title: Wag the Dog

mov85.plot: Two mutants come to a private academy for mutants whose resident superhero team must oppose a powerful mutant terrorist organization.
mov85.title: X-Men

mov86.plot: When a shy groom practices his wedding vows in the inadvertent presence of a deceased young woman, she rises from the grave assuming he has married her.
mov86.title: Corpse Bride

mov87.plot: 7 complete strangers of widely varying personality characteristics are involuntarily placed in an endless kafkaesque maze containing deadly traps.
mov87.title: Cube

mov88.plot: A boy makes friends with an innocent alien giant robot that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.
mov88.title: The Iron Giant

mov89.plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
mov89.title: The Matrix

mov90.plot: An office employee and a soap salesman build a global organization to help vent male aggression.
mov90.title: Fight Club

mov91.plot: A young Shakespeare, out of ideas and short of cash, meets his ideal woman and is inspired to write one of his most famous plays.
mov91.title: Shakespeare in Love

mov92.plot: A paranoid mathematician searches for a key number that will unlock the universal patterns found in nature.
mov92.title: Pi

mov93.plot: A lazy law school grad adopts a kid to impress his girlfriend, but everything doesn't go as planned and he becomes the unlikely foster father.
mov93.title: Big Daddy

mov94.plot: When bitten by a genetically modified spider, a nerdy, shy, and awkward high school student gains spider-like abilities that he eventually must use to fight evil as a superhero after tragedy befalls his family.
mov94.title: Spider-Man

mov95.plot: Three middle-class New Jersey sisters all have their problems with their families and sex lives.
mov95.title: Happiness

mov96.plot: A young writer who follows strangers for material meets a thief who takes him under his wing.
mov96.title: Following

mov97.plot: Ichabod Crane is sent to Sleepy Hollow to investigate the decapitations of 3 people with the culprit being the legendary apparition, the Headless Horseman.
mov97.title: Sleepy Hollow

mov98.plot: Four teenage boys enter a pact to lose their virginity by prom night.
mov98.title: American Pie

mov99.plot: After a car wreck on the winding Mulholland Drive renders a woman amnesic, she and a perky Hollywood-hopeful search for clues and answers across Los Angeles in a twisting venture beyond dreams and reality.
mov99.title: Mulholland Dr.

mov100.plot: A demon, raised from infancy after being conjured by and rescued from the Nazis, grows up to become a defender against the forces of darkness.
mov100.title: Hellboy

mov101.plot: The former Fellowship of the Ring prepare for the final battle for Middle Earth, while Frodo & Sam approach Mount Doom to destroy the One Ring.
mov101.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

mov102.plot: Frodo and Sam continue on to Mordor in their mission to destroy the One Ring. Whilst their former companions make new allies and launch an assault on Isengard.
mov102.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers

mov103.plot: A boy who communicates with spirits that don't know they're dead seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.
mov103.title: The Sixth Sense

mov105.plot: An epic mosaic of several interrelated characters in search of happiness, forgiveness, and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.
mov105.title: Magnolia

mov106.plot: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island individuals are shattered when their addictions become stronger.
mov106.title: Requiem for a Dream

mov107.plot: In the future, criminals are caught before the crimes they commit, but one of the officers in the special unit is accused of one such crime and sets out to prove his innocence.
mov107.title: Minority Report

mov108.plot: A high-school boy is given the chance to write a story for Rolling Stone Magazine about an up-and-coming rock band as he accompanies it on their concert tour.
mov108.title: Almost Famous

mov109.plot: Two warriors in pursuit of a stolen sword and a notorious fugitive are led to an impetuous, physically-skilled, teenage nobleman's daughter, who is at a crossroads in her life.
mov109.title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon

mov110.plot: Scientists genetically create a new Pokémon, Mewtwo, but the results are horrific and disastrous.
mov110.title: Pokémon: The First Movie

mov111.plot: After having a vision of his friends crashing in a plane, he tells them not to get on only later his friends start getting killed one by one.
mov111.title: Final Destination

mov112.plot: Monsters generate their city's power by scaring children, but they are terribly afraid themselves of being contaminated by children, so when one enters Monstropolis, top scarer Sulley finds his world disrupted.
mov112.title: Monsters, Inc.

mov113.plot: In 2027, in a chaotic world in which humans can no longer procreate, a former activist agrees to help transport a miraculously pregnant woman to a sanctuary at sea, where her child's birth may help scientists save the future of humankind.
mov113.title: Children of Men

mov114.plot: After an accident, a chauvenistic executive gains the ability to hear what women are really thinking.
mov114.title: What Women Want

mov115.plot: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers, and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.
mov115.title: Snatch.

mov116.plot: A man, suffering from short-term memory loss, uses notes and tattoos to hunt for the man he thinks killed his wife.
mov116.title: Memento

mov117.plot: Amelie, an innocent and naive girl in Paris, with her own sense of justice, decides to help those around her and along the way, discovers love.
mov117.title: Amélie

mov118.plot: A highly advanced robotic boy longs to become real so that he can regain the love of his human mother.
mov118.title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence

mov119.plot: In 1863, Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points area of New York City seeking revenge against Bill the Butcher, his father's killer.
mov119.title: Gangs of New York

mov120.plot: A suspense thriller with supernatural overtones that revolves around a man who learns something extraordinary about himself after a devastating accident.
mov120.title: Unbreakable

mov121.plot: A young boy attempts to make the world a better place after his teacher gives him that chance.
mov121.title: Pay it Forward

mov122.plot: Neo and the rebel leaders estimate that they have 72 hours until 250,000 probes discover Zion and destroy it and its inhabitants. During this, Neo must decide how he can save Trinity from a dark fate in his dreams.
mov122.title: The Matrix Reloaded

mov123.plot: Danny Ocean and his ten accomplices plan to rob three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously.
mov123.title: Ocean's Eleven

mov124.plot: The human city of Zion defends itself against the massive invasion of the machines as Neo fights to end the war at another front while also opposing the rogue Agent Smith.
mov124.title: The Matrix Revolutions

mov125.plot: In the middle of her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and monsters; where humans are changed into animals; and a bathhouse for these creatures.
mov125.title: Spirited Away

mov126.plot: In Mexico, two teenage boys and an attractive older woman embark on a road trip and learn a thing or two about life, friendship, sex, and each other.
mov126.title: Y Tu Mamá También

mov127.plot: A horrific car accident connects three stories, each involving characters dealing with loss, regret, and life's harsh realities, all in the name of love.
mov127.title: Amores Perros

mov128.plot: A troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a large bunny rabbit that manipulates him to commit a series of crimes, after narrowly escaping a bizarre accident.
mov128.title: Donnie Darko

mov129.plot: A talented young boy becomes torn between his unexpected love of dance and the disintegration of his family.
mov129.title: Billy Elliot

mov130.plot: A Spanish coming of age story focusing on the antics of two 17 year olds, who have a posh beach house almost all to themselves one summer. This is also a summer of sexual awakenings.
mov130.title: Nico and Dani

mov131.plot: It is 1939, the end of three years of bloody civil war in Spain, and General Franco's right-wing Nationalists...
mov131.title: The Devil's Backbone

mov132.plot: A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and without memory, then races to elude assassins and recover from amnesia.
mov132.title: The Bourne Identity

mov133.plot: In the DMZ separating North and South Korea, two North Korean soldiers have been killed, supposedly by one South Korean soldier...
mov133.title: J.S.A.: Joint Security Area

mov134.plot: A true story about Frank Abagnale Jr. who, before his 19th birthday, successfully conned millions of dollars worth of checks as a Pan Am pilot, doctor, and legal prosecutor.
mov134.title: Catch Me If You Can

mov135.plot: An estranged family of former child prodigies reunites when one of their member announces he has a terminal illness.
mov135.title: The Royal Tenenbaums

mov136.plot: In the future, the Japanese government captures a class of ninth-grade students and forces them to kill each other under the revolutionary Battle Royale act.
mov136.title: Battle Royale

mov137.plot: A father-son underwater adventure featuring Nemo, a boy clownfish, stolen from his coral reef home. His timid father must then travel to Sydney and search Sydney Harbour to find Nemo.
mov137.title: Finding Nemo

mov138.plot: The Bride wakes up after a long coma. The baby that she carried before entering the coma is gone. The only thing on her mind is to have revenge on the assassination team that betrayed her - a team she was once part of.
mov138.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1

mov139.plot: A lovelorn screenwriter turns to his less talented twin brother for help when his efforts to adapt a non-fiction book go nowhere.
mov139.title: Adaptation.

mov140.plot: Set during the Ice Age, a sabertooth tiger, a sloth, and a wooly mammoth find a lost human infant, and they try to return him to his tribe.
mov140.title: Ice Age

mov141.plot: A beleaguered small-business owner gets a harmonium and embarks on a romantic journey with a mysterious woman.
mov141.title: Punch-Drunk Love

mov142.plot: An examination on the effect of Franco-era religious schooling and sexual abuse on the lives of two longtime friends.
mov142.title: Bad Education

mov143.plot: Based on Nick Hornby's best-selling novel, About A Boy is the story of a cynical, immature young man who is taught how to act like a grown-up by a little boy
mov143.title: About a Boy

mov144.plot: Two Los Angeles homicide detectives are dispatched to a northern town where the sun doesn't set to investigate the methodical murder of a local teen.
mov144.title: Insomnia

mov145.plot: Hitman El Mariachi becomes involved in international espionage involving a psychotic CIA agent and a corrupt Mexican general.
mov145.title: Once Upon a Time in Mexico

mov146.plot: A family living on a farm finds mysterious crop circles in their fields which suggests something more frightening to come.
mov146.title: Signs

mov147.plot: When her grandson is kidnapped during the Tour de France, Madame Souza and her beloved pooch Bruno team up with the Belleville Sisters--an aged song-and-dance team from the days of Fred Astaire--to rescue him.
mov147.title: The Triplets of Belleville

mov148.plot: Four weeks after a mysterious, incurable virus spreads throughout the UK, a handful of survivors try to find sanctuary.
mov148.title: 28 Days Later...

mov149.plot: A retired FBI agent with psychological gifts is assigned to help track down The Tooth Fairy, a mysterious serial killer; aiding him is imprisoned criminal genius Hannibal The Cannibal Lecter.
mov149.title: Red Dragon

mov150.plot: A young man blocks out harmful memories of significant events of his life. As he grows up, he finds a way to remember these lost memories and a supernatural way to alter his life.
mov150.title: The Butterfly Effect

mov151.plot: The X-Men band together to find a mutant assassin who has made an attempt on the President's life, while the Mutant Academy is attacked by military forces.
mov151.title: X2

mov152.plot: Harry ignores warnings not to return to Hogwarts, only to find the school plagued by a series of mysterious attacks and a strange voice haunting him.
mov152.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

mov153.plot: A young journalist must investigate a mysterious videotape which seems to cause the death of anyone in a week of viewing it.
mov153.title: The Ring

mov154.plot: Princess Fiona's parents invite her and Shrek to dinner to celebrate her marriage. If only they knew the newlyweds were both ogres.
mov154.title: Shrek 2

mov155.plot: A series of Rashomon-like flashback accounts shape the story of how one man defeated three assassins who sought to murder the most powerful warlord in pre-unified China.
mov155.title: Hero

mov156.plot: It's Harry's third year at Hogwarts; not only does he have a new Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher, but there is also trouble brewing. Convicted murderer Sirius Black has escaped the Wizards' Prison and is coming after Harry.
mov156.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

mov157.plot: A miserable conman and his partner pose as Santa and his Little Helper to rob department stores on Christmas Eve. But they run into problems when the conman befriends a troubled kid, and the security boss discovers the plot.
mov157.title: Bad Santa

mov158.plot: When Kimberly has a violent premonition of a highway pileup she blocks the freeway, keeping a few others meant to die, safe...Or are they? The survivors mysteriously start dying and it's up to Kimberly to stop it before she's next.
mov158.title: Final Destination 2

mov159.plot: A wrongfully convicted boy is sent to a brutal desert detention camp where he joins the job of digging holes for some mysterious reason.
mov159.title: Holes

mov160.plot: Follows the lives of eight very different couples in dealing with their love lives in various loosely and interrelated tales all set during a frantic month before Christmas in London, England.
mov160.title: Love Actually

mov161.plot: A guy who complains about God too often is given almighty powers to teach him how difficult it is to run the world.
mov161.title: Bruce Almighty

mov162.plot: A freak accident brings together a critically ill mathematician, a grieving mother (Watts) and a born-again ex-con.
mov162.title: 21 Grams

mov163.plot: Peter Parker is beset with troubles in his failing personal life as he battles a brilliant scientist named Doctor Otto Octavius, who becomes Doctor Octopus (aka Doc Ock), after an accident causes him to bond psychically with mechanical tentacles that do his bidding.
mov163.title: Spider-Man 2

mov164.plot: A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.
mov164.title: Cars

mov165.plot: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.
mov165.title: The Incredibles

mov166.plot: Ethan Hunt comes face to face with a dangerous and sadistic arms dealer while trying to keep his identity secret in order to protect his girlfriend.
mov166.title: Mission: Impossible III

mov167.plot: A story about a son trying to learn more about his dying father by reliving stories and myths his father told him about himself.
mov167.title: Big Fish

mov168.plot: A climatologist tries to figure out a way to save the world from abrupt global warming. He must get to his young son in New York, which is being taken over by a new ice age.
mov168.title: The Day After Tomorrow

mov169.plot: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate Captain Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.
mov169.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl

mov170.plot: A coming-of-age story about a shy, young boy sent by his irresponsible mother to spend the summer with his wealthy, eccentric uncles in Texas.
mov170.title: Secondhand Lions

mov171.plot: An adventurous girl finds another world that is a strangely idealized version of her frustrating home, but it has sinister secrets.
mov171.title: Coraline

mov172.plot: In Mexico City, a former assassin swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.
mov172.title: Man on Fire

mov173.plot: Harry finds himself selected as an underaged competitor in a dangerous multi-wizardary school competition.
mov173.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

mov174.plot: A quietly troubled young man returns home for his mother's funeral after being estranged from his family for a decade.
mov174.title: Garden State

mov175.plot: A movie star with a sense of emptiness, and a neglected newlywed meet up as strangers in Tokyo, Japan and form an unlikely bond.
mov175.title: Lost in Translation

mov176.plot: A couple undergo a procedure to erase each other from their memories when their relationship turns sour, but it is only through the process of loss that they discover what they had to begin with.
mov176.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind

mov177.plot: A story between a mole in the police department and an undercover cop. Their objectives are the same: to find out who is the mole, and who is the cop.
mov177.title: Infernal Affairs

mov178.plot: In the year 2035 a techno-phobic cop investigates a crime that may have been perpetrated by a robot, which leads to a larger threat to humanity.
mov178.title: I, Robot

mov179.plot: SpongeBob SquarePants takes leave from the town of Bikini Bottom in order to track down King Neptune's stolen crown.
mov179.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie

mov180.plot: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking home.
mov180.title: Howl's Moving Castle

mov181.plot: A bored married couple is surprised to learn that they are both assassins hired by competing agencies to kill each other.
mov181.title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith

mov182.plot: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a group of Jewish-American soldiers known as The Basterds are chosen specifically to spread fear throughout the Third Reich by scalping and brutally killing Nazis.
mov182.title: Inglourious Basterds

mov183.plot: An industrial worker who hasn't slept in a year begins to doubt his own sanity
mov183.title: The Machinist

mov184.plot: With a plan to exact revenge on a mythical shark that killed his partner, oceanographer Steve Zissou rallies a crew that includes his estranged wife, a journalist, and a man who may or may not be his son.
mov184.title: The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou

mov185.plot: Four kids travel through a wardrobe to the land of Narnia and learn of their destiny to free it with the guidance of a mystical lion.
mov185.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe

mov186.plot: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for 15 years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in 5 days.
mov186.title: Oldboy

mov187.plot: A group of misfits enter a Las Vegas dodgeball tournament in order to save their cherished local gym from the onslaught of a corporate health fitness chain.
mov187.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story

mov188.plot: A man decides to turn his moribund life around by winning back his ex-girlfriend, reconciling his relationship with his mother, and dealing with an entire community that has returned from the dead to eat the living.
mov188.title: Shaun of the Dead

mov189.plot: Based on the true childhood experiences of Noah Baumbach and his brother, The Squid and the Whale tells the touching story of two young boys dealing with their parents' divorce in Brooklyn in the 1980s.
mov189.title: The Squid and the Whale

mov190.plot: A young boy wins a tour through the most magnificent chocolate factory in the world, led by the world's most unusual candy maker.
mov190.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory

mov191.plot: The population of a small, isolated countryside village believe that their alliance with the mysterious creatures that inhabit the forest around them is coming to an end.
mov191.title: The Village

mov192.plot: A treasure hunter is in hot pursuit of a mythical treasure that has been passed down for centuries, while his employer turned enemy is onto the same path that he's on.
mov192.title: National Treasure

mov193.plot: A teenage hustler and a young man obsessed with alien abductions cross paths, together discovering a horrible, liberating truth.
mov193.title: Mysterious Skin

mov194.plot: Mere seconds before the Earth is to be demolished by an alien construction crew, journeyman Arthur Dent is swept off the planet by his friend Ford Prefect, a researcher penning a new edition of The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy.
mov194.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy

mov195.plot: When wealthy industrialist Tony Stark is forced to build an armored suit after a life-threatening incident, he ultimately decides to use its technology to fight against evil.
mov195.title: Iron Man

mov196.plot: When Jason Bourne is framed for a botched CIA operation he is forced to take up his former life as a trained assassin to survive.
mov196.title: The Bourne Supremacy

mov197.plot: Popular Broadway actor Gary Johnston is recruited by the elite counter-terrorism organization Team America: World Police. As the world begins to crumble around him, he must battle with terrorists, celebrities and falling in love.
mov197.title: Team America: World Police

mov198.plot: The story of how Bruce Wayne became what he was destined to be: Batman.
mov198.title: Batman Begins

mov199.plot: On a quest to find out what happened to his missing brother, a scientist, his nephew and their mountain guide discover a fantastic and dangerous lost world in the center of the earth.
mov199.title: Journey to the Center of the Earth

mov200.plot: In Shanghai, China in the 1940s, a wannabe gangster aspires to join the notorious Axe Gang while residents of a housing complex exhibit extraordinary powers in defending their turf.
mov200.title: Kung Fu Hustle

mov201.plot: With their warning about Lord Voldemort's return scoffed at, Harry and Dumbledore are targeted by the Wizard authorities as an authoritarian bureaucrat slowly seizes power at Hogwarts.
mov201.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

mov202.plot: Set in futuristic Metro City, Astro Boy is about a young robot with incredible powers created by a brilliant...
mov202.title: Astro Boy

mov203.plot: When a cure is found to treat mutations, lines are drawn amongst the X-Men, led by Professor Charles Xavier, and the Brotherhood, a band of powerful mutants organized under Xavier's former ally, Magneto.
mov203.title: X-Men: The Last Stand

mov204.plot: The murderous Bride continues her vengeance quest against her ex-boss, Bill, and his two remaining associates; his younger brother Budd, and Bill's latest flame Elle.
mov204.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2

mov205.plot: In his first mission, James Bond must stop Le Chiffre, a banker to the world's terrorist organizations, from winning a high-stakes poker tournament at Casino Royale in Montenegro.
mov205.title: Casino Royale

mov206.plot: Remy is a young rat in the French countryside who arrives in Paris, only to find out that his cooking idol is dead. When he makes an unusual alliance with a restaurant's new garbage boy, the culinary and personal adventures begin despite Remy's family's skepticism and the rat-hating world of humans.
mov206.title: Ratatouille

mov207.plot: A romantic police captain breaks a beautiful member of a rebel group out of prison to help her rejoin her fellows, but things are not what they seem.
mov207.title: House of Flying Daggers

mov208.plot: In a parallel universe, young Lyra Belacqua journeys to the far North to save her best friend and other kidnapped children from terrible experiments by a mysterious organization.
mov208.title: The Golden Compass

mov209.plot: An adaptation of Maurice Sendak's classic children's story, where Max, a disobedient little boy sent to bed without his supper, creates his own world--a forest inhabited by ferocious wild creatures that crown Max as their ruler.
mov209.title: Where The Wild Things Are

mov210.plot: With a dead body laying between them, two men wake up in the secure lair of a serial killer who's been nicknamed Jigsaw. The men must follow various rules and objectives if they wish to survive and win the deadly game set for them.
mov210.title: Saw

mov211.plot: A married couple is terrorized by a series of videotapes planted on their front porch.
mov211.title: Caché

mov212.plot: Based on the 'E. Annie Proulx' story about a forbidden and secretive relationship between two cowboys and their lives over the years.
mov212.title: Brokeback Mountain

mov213.plot: Four friends/fledgling entrepreneurs, knowing that there's something bigger and more innovative than the different error-checking devices they've built, wrestle over their new invention.
mov213.title: Primer

mov214.plot: The true-life story of Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager who housed over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda.
mov214.title: Hotel Rwanda

mov215.plot: Jean-Baptiste Grenouille, born with a superior olfactory sense, creates the world's finest perfume. His work, however, takes a dark turn as he searches for the ultimate scent.
mov215.title: Perfume: The Story of a Murderer

mov216.plot: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.
mov216.title: Tangled

mov217.plot: A preteen's life is changed after befriending the new girl at school.
mov217.title: Bridge to Terabithia

mov218.plot: A man goes on the run after he discovers that he is actually a harvestable being, and is being kept as a source of replacement parts, along with others, in a Utopian facility.
mov218.title: The Island

mov219.plot: A film that explores the dark and miserable town, Basin City, and tells the story of three different people, all caught up in violent corruption.
mov219.title: Sin City

mov220.plot: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.
mov220.title: The Lives of Others

mov221.plot: Set in a world where superheroes are commonly known and accepted, young Will Stronghold, the son of the Commander and Jetstream, tries to find a balance between being a normal teenager and an extraordinary being.
mov221.title: Sky High

mov222.plot: Goaded by his buddies, a nerdy guy who's never done the deed only finds the pressure mounting when he meets a single mother.
mov222.title: The 40 Year Old Virgin

mov223.plot: Two men from opposite sides of the law are undercover within the Massachusetts State Police and the Irish mafia, but violence and bloodshed boil when discoveries are made, and the moles are dispatched to find out their enemy's identities.
mov223.title: The Departed

mov224.plot: The infamous story of Benjamin Barker, a.k.a Sweeney Todd, who sets up a barber shop down in London which is the basis for a sinister partnership with his fellow tenant, Mrs. Lovett. Based on the hit Broadway musical.
mov224.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street

mov225.plot: In an alternate 1985 where former superheroes exist, the murder of a colleague sends active vigilante Rorschach into his own sprawling investigation, uncovering something that could completely change the course of history as we know it.
mov225.title: Watchmen

mov226.plot: The mythical world starts a rebellion against humanity in order to rule the Earth, so Hellboy and his team must save the world from the rebellious creatures.
mov226.title: Hellboy II: The Golden Army

mov227.plot: God contacts Congressman Evan Baxter and tells him to build an ark in preparation for a great flood.
mov227.title: Evan Almighty

mov228.plot: A strange black entity from another world bonds with Peter Parker and causes inner turmoil as he contends with new villains, temptations, and revenge.
mov228.title: Spider-Man 3

mov229.plot: Spanning over one thousand years, and three parallel stories, The Fountain is a story of love, death, spirituality, and the fragility of our existence in this world.
mov229.title: The Fountain

mov230.plot: #1 NASCAR driver Ricky Bobby stays atop the heap thanks to a pact with his best friend and teammate, Cal Naughton, Jr. But when a French Formula One driver, makes his way up the ladder, Ricky Bobby's talent and devotion are put to the test.
mov230.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby

mov231.plot: Upon moving into the run-down Spiderwick Estate with their mother, twin brothers Jared and Simon Grace, along with their sister Mallory, find themselves pulled into an alternate world full of faeries and other creatures.
mov231.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles

mov232.plot: King Leonidas and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.

mov233.plot: An FBI agent takes on a plane full of deadly and poisonous snakes, deliberately released to kill a witness being flown from Honolulu to Los Angeles to testify against a mob boss.
mov233.title: Snakes on a Plane

mov234.plot: As Harry Potter begins his 6th year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, he discovers an old book marked mysteriously This book is the property of the Half-Blood Prince and begins to learn more about Lord Voldemort's dark past.
mov234.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

mov235.plot: An ancient struggle re-erupts on Earth between two extraterrestrial clans, the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons, with a clue to the ultimate power held by a young teenager.
mov235.title: Transformers

mov236.plot: An IRS auditor suddenly finds himself the subject of narration only he can hear: narration that begins to affect his entire life, from his work, to his love-interest, to his death.
mov236.title: Stranger Than Fiction

mov237.plot: A mature 14-year old girl meets a charming 32-year old photographer on the Internet. Suspecting that he is a pedophile, she goes to his home in an attempt to expose him.
mov237.title: Hard Candy

mov238.plot: Jealous colleagues conspire to get a top London cop transferred to a small town and paired with a witless new partner. On the beat, the pair stumble upon a series of suspicious accidents and events.
mov238.title: Hot Fuzz

mov239.plot: A drama with fairy tale elements, where an orphaned musical prodigy uses his gift as a clue to finding his birth parents.
mov239.title: August Rush

mov240.plot: An urbane fox cannot resist returning to his farm raiding ways and then must help his community survive the farmers' retaliation.
mov240.title: Fantastic Mr. Fox

mov241.plot: Jigsaw locks a few unlucky people in a booby trapped shelter and they must find a way out before they inhale too much of a lethal nerve gas and die. But they must watch out, for the traps Jigsaw has set in the shelter lead to death also.
mov241.title: Saw II

mov242.plot: A shadowy freedom fighter known only as V uses terrorist tactics to fight against his totalitarian society. Upon rescuing a girl from the secret police, he also finds his best chance at having an ally.
mov242.title: V for Vendetta

mov243.plot: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.
mov243.title: Toy Story 3

mov244.plot: Jason Bourne dodges a ruthless CIA official and his agents from a new assassination program while searching for the origins of his life as a trained killer.
mov244.title: The Bourne Ultimatum

mov245.plot: In the Valley of Peace, Po the Panda finds himself chosen as the Dragon Warrior despite the fact that he is obese and a complete novice at martial arts.
mov245.title: Kung Fu Panda

mov246.plot: After her death, a mother returns to her home town in order to fix the situations she couldn't resolve during her life.
mov246.title: Volver

mov247.plot: The warrior Beowulf must fight and defeat the monster Grendel who is terrorizing towns, and later, Grendel's mother, who begins killing out of revenge.
mov247.title: Beowulf

mov248.plot: Kazakh TV talking head Borat is dispatched to the United States to report on the greatest country in the world. With a documentary crew in tow, Borat becomes more interested in locating and marrying Pamela Anderson.
mov248.title: Borat: Cultural Learnings of America for Make Benefit Glorious Nation of Kazakhstan

mov249.plot: A San Francisco cartoonist becomes an amateur detective obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac killer.
mov249.title: Zodiac

mov250.plot: You, the Living is a film about humankind, its greatness and its baseness, joy and sorrow, its self-confidence and anxiety, its desire to love and be loved.
mov250.title: You The Living

mov251.plot: Scott Pilgrim must defeat his new girlfriend's seven evil exes in order to win her heart.
mov251.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. The World

mov252.plot: A coming of age story about a shy teenage boy trying to escape from the influence of his domineering mother. His world changes when he begins to work for a retired actress.
mov252.title: Driving Lessons

mov253.plot: A teacher opens a time capsule that has been dug up at his son's elementary school; in it are some chilling predictions -- some that have already occurred and others that are about to -- that lead him to believe his family plays a role in the events that are about to unfold.
mov253.title: Knowing

mov254.plot: A team of astronauts are sent to re-ignite the dying sun 50 years into the future.
mov254.title: Sunshine

mov255.plot: A family determined to get their young daughter into the finals of a beauty pageant take a cross-country trip in their VW bus.
mov255.title: Little Miss Sunshine

mov256.plot: Bob Munro and his dysfunctional family rent an RV for a road trip to the Colorado Rockies, where they ultimately have to contend with a bizarre community of campers.
mov256.title: RV

mov257.plot: Tragedy strikes a married couple on vacation in the Moroccan desert, touching off an interlocking story involving four different families.
mov257.title: Babel

mov258.plot: A fisherman, a smuggler, and a syndicate of businessmen match wits over the possession of a priceless diamond.
mov258.title: Blood Diamond

mov259.plot: After thirteen and half years in prison for kidnapping and murdering the boy Park Won-mo, Geum-ja Lee is released and tries to fix her life...
mov259.title: Sympathy for Lady Vengeance

mov260.plot: A British writer struggles to fit in at a high-profile magazine in New York. Based on Toby Young's memoir How to Lose Friends & Alienate People.
mov260.title: How to Lose Friends & Alienate People

mov261.plot: Based on the events of the brutal Ugandan dictator Idi Amin's regime as seen by his personal physician during the 1970s
mov261.title: The Last King of Scotland

mov262.plot: In the fascist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.
mov262.title: Pan's Labyrinth

mov263.plot: After being deemed unfit for military service, Steve Rogers volunteers for a top secret research project that turns him into Captain America, a superhero dedicated to defending America's ideals.
mov263.title: Captain America: The First Avenger

mov264.plot: A naive young woman comes to New York and scores a job as the assistant to one of the city's biggest magazine editors, the ruthless and cynical Miranda Priestly.
mov264.title: The Devil Wears Prada

mov265.plot: After seeking to live a normal life, Logan sets out to avenge the death of his girlfriend by undergoing the mutant Weapon X program and becoming Wolverine.
mov265.title: X-Men Origins: Wolverine

mov266.plot: In a hospital on the outskirts of 1920s Los Angeles, an injured stuntman begins to tell a fellow patient, a little girl with a broken arm, a fantastical story about 5 mythical heroes. Thanks to his fractured state of mind and her vivid imagination, the line between fiction and reality starts to blur as the tale advances.
mov266.title: The Fall

mov267.plot: An actress's perception of reality becomes increasingly distorted as she finds herself falling for her co-star in a remake of an unfinished Polish production that was supposedly cursed.
mov267.title: Inland Empire

mov268.plot: After Homer accidentally pollutes the town's water supply, Springfield is encased in a gigantic dome by the EPA and the Simpsons family are declared fugitives.
mov268.title: The Simpsons Movie

mov269.plot: Six months after the rage virus was inflicted on the population of Great Britain, the US Army helps to secure a small area of London for the survivors to repopulate and start again. But not everything goes to plan.
mov269.title: 28 Weeks Later

mov270.plot: A woman brings her family back to her childhood home, where she opens an orphanage for handicapped children. Before long, her son starts to communicate with an invisible new friend.
mov270.title: The Orphanage

mov271.plot: One summer, four orphans boys who have grown to be the closest of friends find themselves competing for the attention of the same family.
mov271.title: December Boys

mov272.plot: Faced with an unplanned pregnancy, an offbeat young woman makes an unusual decision regarding her unborn child.
mov272.title: Juno

mov273.plot: Batman, Gordon and Harvey Dent are forced to deal with the chaos unleashed by an anarchist mastermind known only as the Joker, as he drives each of them to their limits.
mov273.title: The Dark Knight

mov274.plot: A story about family, greed, religion, and oil, centered around a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.
mov274.title: There Will Be Blood

mov275.plot: A young fugitive prince and princess must stop a villain who unknowingly threatens to destroy the world with a special dagger that enables the magic sand inside to reverse time.
mov275.title: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time

mov276.plot: A film set in a strange afterlife way station that has been reserved for people who have committed suicide.
mov276.title: Wristcutters: A Love Story

mov277.plot: A newly recruited night security guard at the Museum of Natural History discovers that an ancient curse causes the animals and exhibits on display to come to life and wreak havoc.
mov277.title: Night at the Museum

mov278.plot: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon some dead bodies, a stash of heroin and more than $2 million in cash near the Rio Grande.
mov278.title: No Country for Old Men

mov279.plot: For fun loving party animal Ben Stone, the last thing he ever expected was for his one night stand to show up on his doorstep eight weeks later to tell him she's pregnant.
mov279.title: Knocked Up

mov280.plot: Years after a plague kills most of humanity and transforms the rest into monsters, the sole survivor in New York City struggles valiantly to find a cure.
mov280.title: I Am Legend

mov281.plot: The rivalry between two magicians is exacerbated when one of them performs the ultimate illusion.
mov281.title: The Prestige

mov282.plot: A tale that spans different time zones of the 20th and 21st centuries.
mov282.title: Mr. Nobody

mov283.plot: A documentary on kids who attend a summer camp hoping to become the next Billy Graham.
mov283.title: Jesus Camp

mov284.plot: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man makes a promise to his beloved that he'll retrieve a fallen star by venturing into the magical realm.
mov284.title: Stardust

mov285.plot: A teen living under house arrest becomes convinced his neighbor is a serial killer.
mov285.title: Disturbia

mov286.plot: Jigsaw kidnaps a doctor to keep him alive while he watches his new apprentice put an unlucky citizen through a brutal test.
mov286.title: Saw III

mov287.plot: A frustrated office worker learns that he is the son of a professional assassin, and that he shares his father's superhuman killing abilities.
mov287.title: Wanted

mov288.plot: Danny Ocean rounds up the boys for a third heist, after casino owner Willy Bank double-crosses one of the original eleven, Reuben Tishkoff.
mov288.title: Ocean's Thirteen

mov289.plot: A documentary on Al Gore's campaign to make the issue of global warming a recognized problem worldwide.
mov289.title: An Inconvenient Truth

mov290.plot: The Pevensie siblings return to Narnia, where they are enlisted to once again help ward off an evil king and restore the rightful heir to the land's throne, Prince Caspian.
mov290.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian

mov291.plot: A paraplegic marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.
mov291.title: Avatar

mov292.plot: A chronicle of the early days of James T. Kirk and his fellow USS Enterprise crew members.
mov292.title: Star Trek

mov293.plot: The powerful but arrogant warrior Thor is cast out of the fantastic realm of Asgard and sent to live amongst humans on Earth, where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.
mov293.title: Thor

mov294.plot: Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon works to solve a murder and prevent a terrorist act against the Vatican.
mov294.title: Angels & Demons

mov295.plot: A bad deed on the part of a tough minor-league hockey player results in an unusual sentence: He must serve one week as a real-life tooth fairy.
mov295.title: Tooth Fairy

mov296.plot: Friends, family, and lovers struggle to find love, forgiveness, and meaning in a war-torn world riddled with comedy and pathos.
mov296.title: Life During Wartime

mov297.plot: A teenager discovers he's the descendant of a Greek god and sets out on an adventure to settle an on-going battle between the gods.
mov297.title: Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief

mov298.plot: Two eighth graders start to have feelings for each other despite being total opposites. Based on the novel Flipped by Wendelin Van Draanen.
mov298.title: Flipped

mov299.plot: Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry.
mov299.title: Superbad

mov300.plot: Seeking revenge for the death of his love, secret agent James Bond sets out to stop an environmentalist from taking control of a country's valuable resource.
mov300.title: Quantum of Solace

mov301.plot: As he plans his next job, a longtime thief tries to balance his feelings for a bank manager connected to one of his earlier heists, as well as the FBI agent looking to bring him and his crew down.
mov301.title: The Town

mov302.plot: Two children conceived by artificial insemination bring their birth father into their family life.
mov302.title: The Kids Are All Right

mov303.plot: The Brothers Bloom are the best con men in the world, swindling millionaires with complex scenarios of lust and intrigue. Now they've decided to take on one last job - showing a beautiful and eccentric heiress the time of her life with a romantic adventure that takes them around the world.
mov303.title: The Brothers Bloom

mov304.plot: During a long English summer in the early 1980s, two schoolboys from differing backgrounds set out to make a film inspired by First Blood.
mov304.title: Son of Rambow

mov305.plot: 1997, Captain Nascimento has to find a substitute for his occupation while trying to take down drug dealers and criminals before the Pope comes to Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.
mov305.title: Elite Squad

mov306.plot: A disk containing the memoirs of a CIA agent ends up in the hands of two unscrupulous gym employees who attempt to sell it.
mov306.title: Burn After Reading

mov307.plot: Iraq. Forced to play a dangerous game of cat-and-mouse in the chaos of war, an elite Army bomb squad unit must come together in a city where everyone is a potential enemy and every object could be a deadly bomb.
mov307.title: The Hurt Locker

mov308.plot: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.
mov308.title: How to Train Your Dragon

mov309.plot: Rumpelstiltskin tricks a mid-life crisis burdened Shrek into allowing himself to be erased from existence and cast in a dark alternate timeline where Rumpel rules supreme.
mov309.title: Shrek Forever After

mov310.plot: A post-apocalyptic tale of a man and his son trying to survive by any means possible.
mov310.title: The Road

mov311.plot: In the distant future, a small waste collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.
mov311.title: Wall·E

mov312.plot: A look at the work and surprising success of a four-year-old girl whose paintings have been compared to the likes of Picasso and has raked in hundreds of thousands of dollars.
mov312.title: My Kid Could Paint That

mov313.plot: Set during World War II, a story seen through the innocent eyes of Bruno, the eight-year-old son of the commandant at a concentration camp, whose forbidden friendship with a Jewish boy on the other side of the camp fence has startling and unexpected consequences.
mov313.title: The Boy in the Striped Pajamas

mov314.plot: In a Bronx Catholic school in 1964 a popular priest's ambiguous relationship with a troubled 12 year old black student is questioned by the school's principal.
mov314.title: Doubt

mov315.plot: As Harry races against time and evil to destroy the Horcruxes, he uncovers the existence of three most powerful objects in the wizarding world: the Deathly Hallows.
mov315.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1

mov316.plot: A former spy relies on his old skills to save his estranged daughter, who has been forced into the slave trade.
mov316.title: Taken

mov317.plot: The story follows the adventures of Aang, a young successor to a long line of Avatars, who must put his childhood ways aside and stop the Fire Nation from enslaving the Water, Earth and Air nations.
mov317.title: The Last Airbender

mov318.plot: Through a series of freak occurrences, a group of actors shooting a big-budget war movie are forced to become the soldiers they are portraying.
mov318.title: Tropic Thunder

mov319.plot: An action thriller centered on a soldier who wakes up in the body of an unknown man and discovers he's part of a mission to find the bomber of a Chicago commuter train.
mov319.title: Source Code

mov320.plot: A ballet dancer wins the lead in Swan Lake and is perfect for the role of the delicate White Swan - Princess Odette - but slowly loses her mind as she becomes more and more like Odile, the Black Swan.
mov320.title: Black Swan

mov321.plot: An Israeli Special Forces Soldier fakes his death so he can re-emerge in New York City as a hair stylist.
mov321.title: You Don't Mess with the Zohan

mov322.plot: Master sorcerer Balthazar Blake recruits a seemingly everyday guy in his mission to defend New York City from his arch-nemesis, Maxim Horvath.
mov322.title: The Sorcerer's Apprentice

mov323.plot: For generations, the people of the City of Ember have flourished in an amazing world of glittering lights. But Ember's once powerful generator is failing ... and the great lamps that illuminate the city are starting to flicker.
mov323.title: City of Ember

mov324.plot: Takes place in the days before Christmas near a little-known border crossing on the Mohawk reservation between New York State and Quebec...
mov324.title: Frozen River

mov325.plot: A tale of friendship between two unlikely pen pals: Mary, a lonely, eight-year-old girl living in the suburbs of Melbourne, and Max, a forty-four-year old, severely obese man living in New York.
mov325.title: Mary and Max

mov326.plot: A young girl is institutionalized by her abusive stepfather. Retreating to an alternative reality as a coping strategy, she envisions a plan which will help her escape from the mental facility.
mov326.title: Sucker Punch

mov327.plot: Lucy and Edmund Pevensie return to Narnia with their cousin Eustace where they meet up with Prince Caspian for a trip across the sea aboard the royal ship The Dawn Treader. Along the way they encounter dragons, dwarves, merfolk, and a band of lost warriors before reaching the edge of the world.
mov327.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader

mov328.plot: Told in three interconnected segments, we follow a young man named Takaki through his life as cruel winters, cold technology, and finally, adult obligations and responsibility converge to test the delicate petals of love.
mov328.title: 5 Centimeters Per Second

mov329.plot: Detective Sherlock Holmes and his stalwart partner Watson engage in a battle of wits and brawn with a nemesis whose plot is a threat to all of England.
mov329.title: Sherlock Holmes

mov330.plot: Following the death of his father, Britt Reid, heir to his father's large company, teams up with his late dad's assistant Kato to become a masked crime fighting team.
mov330.title: The Green Hornet

mov331.plot: A 16-year-old who was raised by her father to be the perfect assassin is dispatched on a mission across Europe, tracked by a ruthless intelligence agent and her operatives.
mov331.title: Hanna

mov332.plot: The supervillain Megamind finally conquers his nemesis, the hero Metro Man... but finds his life pointless without a hero to fight.
mov332.title: Megamind

mov333.plot: Lifelong platonic friends Zack and Miri look to solve their respective cash-flow problems by making an adult film together. As the cameras roll, however, the duo begin to sense that they may have more feelings for each other than they previously thought.
mov333.title: Zack and Miri Make a Porno

mov334.plot: A Mumbai teen who grew up in the slums, becomes a contestant on the Indian version of Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? He is arrested under suspicion of cheating, and while being interrogated, events from his life history are shown which explain why he knows the answers.
mov334.title: Slumdog Millionaire

mov335.plot: 19-year-old Alice returns to the magical world from her childhood adventure, where she reunites with her old friends and learns of her true destiny: to end the Red Queen's reign of terror.
mov335.title: Alice in Wonderland

mov336.plot: Two young rebellious scientists are told by their employers to halt groundbreaking work that has seen...
mov336.title: Splice

mov337.plot: An offbeat romantic comedy about a woman who doesn't believe true love exists, and the young man who falls for her.
mov337.title: (500) Days of Summer

mov338.plot: A post-apocalyptic tale, in which a lone man fights his way across America in order to protect a sacred book that holds the secrets to saving humankind.
mov338.title: The Book of Eli

mov339.plot: By tying thousands of balloon to his home, 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen sets out to fulfill his lifelong dream to see the wilds of South America. Right after lifting off, however, he learns he isn't alone on his journey, since Russell, a wilderness explorer 70 years his junior, has inadvertently become a stowaway on the trip.
mov339.title: Up

mov340.plot: Sam Witwicky leaves the Autobots behind for a normal life. But when his mind is filled with cryptic symbols, the Decepticons target him and he is dragged back into the Transformers' war.
mov340.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen

mov341.plot: The story of a young ex-con Jack, newly released from serving a prison sentence for a murder he committed as a child.
mov341.title: Boy A

mov342.plot: A pair of brothers stumble upon a mysterious hole in their basement that leads to the darkest corridors of their fears and nightmares.
mov342.title: The Hole

mov343.plot: The son of a virtual world designer goes looking for his father and ends up inside the digital world that his father designed. He meets his father's creation turned bad and a unique ally who was born inside the digital domain of The Grid.
mov343.title: Tron: Legacy

mov344.plot: Rille, an ostracized and bullied teenager, who only excels in the ping pong room, descends into a life-and-death struggle with his younger, more popular brother when the truth about their father surfaces during their spring break.
mov344.title: The King of Ping Pong

mov345.plot: A Las Vegas-set comedy centered around three groomsmen who lose their about-to-be-wed buddy during their drunken misadventures, then must retrace their steps in order to find him.
mov345.title: The Hangover

mov346.plot: A faded professional wrestler must retire, but finds his quest for a new life outside the ring a dispiriting struggle.
mov346.title: The Wrestler

mov347.plot: A loan officer who evicts an old woman from her home finds herself the recipient of a supernatural curse. Desperate, she turns to a seer to try and save her soul, while evil forces work to push her to a breaking point.
mov347.title: Drag Me to Hell

mov348.plot: Set in 1980s seaside England, this is the story of Edward, an unusual ten year old boy growing up in an old people's home run by his parents...
mov348.title: Is Anybody There?

mov349.plot: Drama set in 1954, U.S. Marshal Teddy Daniels is investigating the disappearance of a murderess who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane and is presumed to be hiding nearby.
mov349.title: Shutter Island

mov350.plot: A journalist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing -- or dead -- for forty years by a young female hacker.
mov350.title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo

mov351.plot: An extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth suddenly finds a kindred spirit in a government agent who is exposed to their biotechnology.
mov351.title: District 9

mov352.plot: Oscar, an overlooked and bullied boy, finds love and revenge through Eli, a beautiful but peculiar girl who turns out to be a vampire.
mov352.title: Let the Right One In

mov353.plot: A filmmaker decides to memorialize a murdered friend when his friend's ex-girlfriend announces she is expecting his son.
mov353.title: Dear Zachary: A Letter to a Son About His Father

mov354.plot: Astronaut Sam Bell has a quintessentially personal encounter toward the end of his three-year stint on the Moon, where he, working alongside his computer, GERTY, sends back to Earth parcels of a resource that has helped diminish our planet's power problems.
mov354.title: Moon

mov355.plot: Rango is an ordinary chameleon who accidentally winds up in the town of Dirt, a lawless outpost in the Wild West in desperate need of a new sheriff.
mov355.title: Rango

mov356.plot: With a job that has him traveling around the country firing people, Ryan Bingham leads an empty life out of a suitcase, until his company does the unexpected: ground him.
mov356.title: Up in the Air

mov357.plot: Harry, Ron and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord.
mov357.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2

mov358.plot: As computer hacker Lisbeth and journalist Mikael investigate a sex-trafficking ring, Lisbeth is accused of three murders, causing her to go on the run while Mikael works to clear her name.
mov358.title: The Girl Who Played with Fire

mov359.plot: A mother desperately searches for the killer that framed her son for their horrific murder.
mov359.title: Mother

mov360.plot: When a young owl is abducted by an evil Owl army, he must escape with newfound friends to seek out the legendary Guardians to stop the menace.
mov360.title: Legend of the Guardians: The Owls of Ga'Hoole

mov361.plot: Because of his superhero alter ego, Tony Stark must contend with deadly issues involving the government, his own friends and new enemies.
mov361.title: Iron Man 2

mov362.plot: A bullied young boy befriends a young female vampire who lives in secrecy with her guardian.
mov362.title: Let Me In

mov363.plot: When his peaceful life is threatened by a high-tech assassin, former black-ops agent Frank Moses reassembles his old team in a last ditch effort to survive and uncover his assailants.
mov363.title: Red

mov364.plot: Dave Lizewski is an unnoticed high school student and comic book fan who one day decides to become a super-hero, even though he has no powers, training or meaningful reason to do so.
mov364.title: Kick-Ass

mov365.plot: Ten years have passed, and Sidney Prescott, who has put herself back together thanks in part to her writing, is visited by the Ghostface Killer.
mov365.title: Scre4m

mov366.plot: A comedy about a man who learns that the things you want most may not be the things that make you happy, and that being lonely is not necessarily the same as being alone.
mov366.title: World's Greatest Dad

mov367.plot: In 1962, Charles Xavier starts up a school and later a team, for humans with superhuman abilities. Among them is Erik Lensherr, his best friend... and future archenemy.
mov367.title: X-Men: First Class

mov368.plot: A clean-cut high school student relies on the school's rumor mill to advance her social and financial standing.
mov368.title: Easy A

mov369.plot: A chronicle of the founding of Facebook, the social-networking Web site.
mov369.title: The Social Network

mov370.plot: An unflattering look inside America's corporate controlled food industry.
mov370.title: Food, Inc.

mov371.plot: A team of mercenaries head to South America on a mission to overthrow a dictator.
mov371.title: The Expendables

mov372.plot: The lives of two Danish families cross each other, and an extraordinary but risky friendship comes into bud. But loneliness, frailty and sorrow lie in wait.
mov372.title: In a Better World

mov373.plot: Lisbeth is recovering in a hospital and awaiting trial for three murders when she is released. Mikael must prove her innocence, but Lisbeth must be willing to share the details of her sordid experiences with the court.
mov373.title: The Girl Who Kicked the Hornet's Nest

mov374.plot: Troublemaking duo Andy Bichlbaum and Mike Bonanno, posing as their industrious alter-egos, expose the people profiting from Hurricane Katrina, the faces behind the environmental disaster in Bhopal, and other shocking events.
mov374.title: The Yes Men Fix the World

mov375.plot: In a world where technology exists to enter the human mind through dream invasion, a highly skilled thief is given a final chance at redemption which involves executing his toughest job to date: Inception.
mov375.title: Inception

mov376.plot: The Autobots learn of a Cybertronian spacecraft hidden on the Moon, and race against the Decepticons to reach it and to learn its secrets.
mov376.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon

mov377.plot: An unflinching Ozark Mountain girl hacks through dangerous social terrain as she hunts down her drug-dealing father while trying to keep her family intact.
mov377.title: Winter's Bone

mov378.plot: A tough U.S. Marshal helps a stubborn young woman track down her father's murderer.
mov378.title: True Grit

mov379.plot: The owner of a Chinese noodle shop's scheme to murder his adulterous wife and her lover goes awry.
mov379.title: A Woman, a Gun and a Noodle Shop

mov380.plot: The story of King George VI of Britain, his impromptu ascension to the throne and the speech therapist who helped the unsure monarch become worthy of it.
mov380.title: The King's Speech

mov381.plot: A mountain climber becomes trapped under a boulder while canyoneering alone near Moab, Utah and resorts to desperate measures in order to survive.
mov381.title: 127 Hours

mov382.plot: The story of how an eccentric French shop keeper and amateur film maker attempted to locate and befriend Banksy...
mov382.title: Exit Through the Gift Shop

mov383.plot: When his pregnant fiancee becomes the latest victim of a serial killer, a secret agent blurs the line between good and evil in his pursuit of revenge.
mov383.title: I Saw the Devil

mov384.plot: A coming-of-age story that follows 12-year-old Andy Nichol (Chase Ellison), a bright student who, like most kids his age...
mov384.title: That's What I Am

mov385.plot: A struggling lawyer and volunteer wrestling coach's chicanery comes back to haunt him when the teenage grandson of the client he's double-crossed comes into his life.
mov385.title: Win Win

mov386.plot: After witnessing a mysterious train crash, a group of friends in the summer of 1979 begin noticing strange happenings going around in their small town, and begin to investigate into the creepy phenomenon.
mov386.title: Super 8
